name: Great Elm Capital Corp.
description: Great Elm Capital Corp. is a publicly traded investment firm that focuses on generating attractive risk-adjusted returns by investing in a diversified portfolio of private and public companies. Established in 2016, the company primarily operates in the business development company (BDC) sector, providing financing solutions to small and middle-market businesses across various industries. Through its investment strategy, Great Elm aims to identify unique opportunities that may be overlooked by traditional investors, leveraging its extensive network and expertise in capital markets. The company is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders through prudent investments and active portfolio management, while maintaining a strong focus on risk management. Great Elm Capital Corp. also seeks to generate recurring income through its investments, making it an attractive option for income-oriented investors. Its commitment to transparency and shareholder engagement further enhances its reputation in the investment community.
